SELECT c.id, c.commission_rate, c.amount, c.status, c.calculate_time, c.issue_time, t.transaction_no, t.deal_price, u.real_name AS sales_name, f.real_name AS finance_name FROM tb_commission c LEFT JOIN tb_transaction t ON c.transaction_id = t.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.sales_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_user f ON c.finance_id = f.id WHERE 1=1
AND t.transaction_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.transactionNo}, '%')
AND u.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.salesName}, '%')
AND c.status = #{dto.status}
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
